column4: any goos resoruces for getting sound to work on ubuntu 9.10 ?
Bash: alsamixer
- it fires up and shows all the levels
still no sond
Make sure they aren't muted, also check to make sure your global audio isn't muted.
Are you sending sound through built-in speakers or external speakers?
How do I get Pidgin's XMPP protocol to conntect to MSN?
external - and ive checked the sound panel and nothing is muted

Are you sure you have the speakers setup correctly as well? In addition to that, is there a power switch for these speakers or is there an amplifier inbetween and is that setup correctly and turned on?
this is an upgrade from 8.10 - its been running fine for a year and i dont even touch the hardware
What is your output depth?
whats that?
paragon: The the bit rate of the audio that you're trying to process?
paragon: Examples: 8bit, 16bit, 32bit
just trying to play an mp3 for tests
Correction: Bit quality, not bit rate.
Try setting it to 16bit quality audio
